trans-unit.source: Collects all errors generated by the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class is created by <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> class.
OdbcErrorCollection always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> class.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> into an array, starting at the specified index within the array.
The array into which to copy the elements.
The starting index of `array`.
The sum of index and the number of elements in the is greater than the length of the array.
The array is .
The index is not valid for array.

Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> starting at the specified destination index.
The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref>.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> at which copying starts.
Gets the number of errors in the collection.
The total number of errors in the collection.

Returns an object that implements the [System.Collections.IEnumerator](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) interface and that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref>.

An object that implements the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref> interface and that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"></xref>.
Gets the error at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the error to retrieve.
An <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref> that contains the error at the specified index.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
